Author: Steven Wilson
column6: He had a vision for a whole sound, a whole ideology around his band, and that’s been very inspirational to me.

Author: Chris Goss
column6: The Mahavishnu Orchestra came out... and the music damaged me for life

Author: Steve Howe
column6: He later told me that I was an influence of his, which was immensely flattering

Author: Rich Robinson
Band: The Black Crowes, The Magpie Salute
column6: To my mind, Peter Green is the finest white man I’ve ever heard playing blues guitar

Author: Paul Gilbert
column6: Trower is sometimes unfairly dismissed for copying Jimi Hendrix – well, there are worse people to imitate!

Author: Wayne Kramer
column6: Morello is so far ahead of the pack it will take years for folks to catch up.

Author: Jim Davies
column6: Paul is human. You can relate to him.

Author: Scott Ian
column6: Malcolm got through a pick for every song, because he hit the strings so hard. It’s amazing.

Author: Charlie Starr
column6: Everything he did was for the good of the band

Author: Paul Mahon
column6: Everything he did was for the good of the band

Author: Steven Van Zandt
column6: He’s really just one of the last examples, in our lifetime, of someone who has a true connection to the old blues players

Author: Keith Nelson
column6: He’s really just one of the last examples, in our lifetime, of someone who has a true connection to the old blues players

Author: Leslie West
column6: He played so many notes that I said he should divide by two

Author: Slash
column6: It’s about how the notes are placed and how you approach them

Author: James Monteith
column6: He’s all about the music; all about the fun and the celebration and the connection with the fans

Author: Jerry Cantrell
column6: He’s all about the music; all about the fun and the celebration and the connection with the fans

Author: Ace Frehley:
column6: Pete Townshend taught me how to play rhythm guitar

Author: Angus Young
column6: There’s a ferocity about his playing that few guitar players can equal – a real fire and certainty that leaps out of every record and performance

Author: Sir Richard Bishop
column6: There’s a ferocity about his playing that few guitar players can equal – a real fire and certainty that leaps out of every record and performance

Author: Jake Burns
column6: There’s a ferocity about his playing that few guitar players can equal – a real fire and certainty that leaps out of every record and performance

Author: Bumbefoot
column6: He has had such an immense effect on rock music.

Author: Dweezil Zappa
column6: Just the ferocity of it was mesmerising.

Author: George Lynch
column6: Just the ferocity of it was mesmerising.

Author: Herman Li
column6: He was such a genius; this motherfucker has a pass for anything

Author: Ben Weinman
column6: He was such a genius; this motherfucker has a pass for anything
